original_title: De Chillida a Hokusai: creación de una obra (From Chillida to Hokusai: birth of a work of art)
overview: A film on basque sculptor Eduardo Chillida's work in Japan, "Homage to Hokusai". Chillida himself talks about his work.
title: De Chillida a Hokusai: creación de una obra (From Chillida to Hokusai: birth of a work of art)
